trans-unit.source: Stores linked resources to be sent as part of an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 存储链接的资源要发送电子邮件消息的一部分。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the LinkedResourceCollection class is returned by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection"></xref>.
Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.
The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法离开<xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>中不可用状态。</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> occupied.
trans-unit.target: 调用 Dispose 后，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>占用。</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> </xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A> on all views in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用<xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A>对此集合中的所有视图。</xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Dispose%2A> method.
You do not need to call it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 不需要在你的应用程序中调用它。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 始终调用释放在发布到<xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>。</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>最后一个引用之前

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它所使用的资源不会释放之前垃圾回收器调用<xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>对象的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>
